Package com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.gifbitmap

Class Summary
GifBitmapWrapper A wrapper that contains either an Bitmap resource or an GifDrawable resource.
GifBitmapWrapperResource A resource that wraps an GifBitmapWrapper.
GifBitmapWrapperResourceDecoder An ResourceDecoder that can decode either an Bitmap or an GifDrawable from an InputStream or a ParcelFileDescriptor.
GifBitmapWrapperResourceEncoder A ResourceEncoder that can encode either an Bitmap or GifDrawable.
GifBitmapWrapperStreamResourceDecoder A ResourceDecoder that can decode an GifBitmapWrapper from InputStream data.
GifBitmapWrapperTransformation A Transformation that can apply a wrapped Bitmap transformation to both Bitmaps and GifDrawable.
ImageVideoGifDrawableLoadProvider An DataLoadProvider that can load either an GifDrawable or an Bitmap from either an InputStream or an ParcelFileDescriptor.
